quote: Children believe what you promise. They are excited and expectant. Your nature must be like theirs: bold, daring, unafraid and eager to experience the victory God has already assured.
quote_letters: CHILDREN BELIEVE WHAT YOU PROMISE THEY ARE EXCITED AND EXPECTANT YOUR NATURE MUST BE LIKE THEIRS BOLD DARING UNAFRAID AND EAGER TO EXPERIENCE THE VICTORY GOD HAS ALREADY ASSURED
